item.title: Random Tumblr Posts #1
item.description: Ugh I write SO MUCH on Tumblr even though I have a blog sitting here just waiting to be used. I’m sorry. I’ll try to make this as painless as possible. I had a dream where I literally just lived out my entire day, down to sitting in lecture being bored and taking notes. You donâ€™t even know how disappointed I am when I woke up knowing that I had to do it all over again.
